text:
From Last Year 

 #Chloroquine was never suitable for #COVID19 however Trump pushed the drug-made Science political.

#Canada trialed the drug, despite medicolegal cautions. Now-like #mefloquine-#hydroxycholoroquine Rx enters into litigation in the U.S.
